results.content: dude is speed running through every and all steps, not only that but at one point where we had to link django to an sql server he assumes, for some reason, that everyone can afford to buy a server and work on it and doesn't take into consideration that some of us can only use the free option, he doesn't explain how to link the Express SQL server to django and pretty much doesn't explain anything at all, as i said, speedrunning the entire course, def not for beginners
